Amusement park, restaurants and souvenirs.
Hosts a collection of jigsaw puzzle which from 2012 to 2017 was recognized to be the biggest in the world according to Guinness.
a 10 hectare theme park with a variety of animals
Amusement and theme park worthy of Instagram

Escape from the stress to recharge and relax in our beautiful natural setting blessed with a cool mountain breeze.

string-array.item: Sonya´s Garden", "A romantic bed and breakfast amidst the verdant and flower-laden garden.
The Carmelence View offers a central view of the lake and, on a clear day, affords a view of three bodies of water, namely, a part of Laguna Lake, Taal Lake and Batangas Bay
This place is haven for flower lovers, plant enthusiasts, and Asian food adventurer

string-array.name: nature_description
string-array.item: Queens Strawberry is a farm to table bed and breakfast located in Alfonso Cavite.
This park has been converted into an urban park and a view deck, overlooking the lush greenery and the lowland. The park also includes a small chapel, a garden, souvenir shops, and food stalls.
Taal Volcano and Taal Lake lie approximately 70 kilometres south of Manila.
From Tagaytay Ridge, visitors can see the reach of the mountain extending out into the sea, obscured in sections by cloud tufts.
If chasing waterfalls is your thing, go see the Ambon-Ambon Falls

Seattle-based coffeehouse chain known for its signature roasts, light bites and WiFi availability.
Known For. Cozy and relaxing ambiance coupled with their delectable selection of coffee.
They serve their own blend of coffee and modern Filipino comfort food!
Coffee and Dreams Tagaytay a newly opened restaurant which serves delicious food and has the perfect ambiance
Char’s Garden Cafe is a small local restaurant that lets you enjoy dining with Filipino food alfresco.
